name: The Little Mouse that Squeaked
description:
A mysterious figure allures you.  A bartender with a pack of cards. They ask you to play their game. 
Your cards have the usual effects: do damage, heal yourself etc., but each card has the added bonus of allowing you to ask a question to the bartender about what transpired that night, who they are, and what they are hiding.

So, would you like to play a game?

And remember, choose wisely.

(Please note: this is a very broken prototype, but I hope you can see and appreciate what the idea was here. We plan to fix this in a future update.)

Music by @SolarFluxx

Art by @Sarahahasmiles

Code by @Simorico
